from azure.storage.blob import BlobServiceClient, BlobClient, ContainerClient
import os
from notebookutils import mssparkutils

def get_configuration():
    return PARAMETERS.DATALAKE, PARAMETERS.RAW_CONTAINER, PARAMETERS.BRONZE_CONTAINER, PARAMETERS.RAW_SASKEY, PARAMETERS.BRONZE_SASKEY

def get_blob_service_client_sas( account: str, sas_token: str) -> BlobServiceClient:
    account_url = account
    credential = sas_token
    blob_service_client = BlobServiceClient(account_url, credential=credential)

    return blob_service_client
account , raw_container, bronze_container, raw_sas_token, bronze_sas_token = get_configuration()

def _prepare_paths_for_data_processing (account: str, raw_container: str, bronze_container: str, folder: str, file_name: str):

    #abfss://raw@sqlday2023.dfs.core.windows.net/customer/part-00000-tid-3200334632332214470-9b4dec79-7e2e-495d-8657-3b5457ed3753-108-1-c000.csv
    #abfss://bronze@sqlday2023.dfs.core.windows.net/AWorks


    account_for_abfss = account.split('://')[-1].replace("blob","dfs")
        
    path_to_blob_raw = "abfss://" + raw_container + "@" + account_for_abfss+"/"+ folder +"/"+file_name
    path_to_blob_bronze = "abfss://" + bronze_container + "@" + account_for_abfss+"/"+ folder +"/"+file_name.split('.')[0]+'.parquet'

    return account_for_abfss, path_to_blob_raw, path_to_blob_bronze

for folder in folders:
    full_path_raw = account + "/" + raw_container 
    full_path_bronze = account + "/" + bronze_container + "/" + folder

    raw_container_client = _get_container_client(raw_bsc, full_path_raw, raw_sas_token)
    bronze_container_client = _get_container_client(raw_bsc,full_path_bronze, bronze_sas_token )

    blob_list = raw_container_client.list_blobs(name_starts_with=folder) 


    for item in blob_list:
        blob = os.path.basename(item.name )

        account_for_abfss, path_to_blob_raw, path_to_blob_bronze = _prepare_paths_for_data_processing(account, raw_container, bronze_container, folder, blob)

        if 'csv' in path_to_blob_raw:
            print (path_to_blob_raw)        
            df = spark.read.load(path_to_blob_raw, format='csv', header=True)
            df.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(path_to_blob_bronze)
